data.eml:eml: Descriptions, records, and key to the Hydrometra Latreille, 1796 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Hydrometridae) from Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martínez, David Camilo, Galindo-Malagón, Ximena Alejandra, Molano, Fredy, Moreira, Felipe Ferraz Figueiredo (2019): Descriptions, records, and key to the Hydrometra Latreille, 1796 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Hydrometridae) from Colombia. Zootaxa 4577 (1): 51-72, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4577.1.3
